summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Holiday Gift Basket For Women, Sandalwood Ylang Oil with Shea Butter & Vitamin E, Spa Gift Set, In Wooden Cabinet. 6 Greeting Cards included
Review Date: 2017/01/16
Store: Pinkleaf
Product Description: ['7pc Ylang-Ylang Sandalwood Aromatherapy Spa Gift Set in Wood Cabinet', 'Is your skin in need of some extra TLC? Searching for some unique spa gift ideas?  Well, we here at Pinkleaf have arranged the perfect spa gift for women & for men!', 'Men & Women Love the Scent!', 'Infused with an aromatic blend of natural essential oils (sandalwood, ylang, sweet orange & jasmine),  the fragrance of our body care is gender-neutral, making this is great spa gift for pampered men & women.', 'Restore, Revive, & Moisturize', "We've used a nutrient-rich base of shea butter & silky vitamin E to pamper, soften & condition the skin.  The scent relaxes & de-stresses, while the formulas hydrate, enhance suppleness & clear imperfections.", 'Naturally Gentle Formulas', 'We make our skincare products in small batches & use only premium grade ingredients to ensure they  are safe for sensitive skin. Pamper your skin & tempt your senses without filmy residue or toxins!', "What's Included?", '8.4 oz Shower Gel, 8.4 oz Bubble Bath, 5.0 oz Body Lotion, 6.7 oz Body Scrub  0.5 oz Flower Soap, 6.4 oz Bath Salts, Bath Loofah + Wooden Curio Box', 'Packaged in Beautiful Cabinet', "All of the spa gift items featured in this bath & body gift basket are housed in a small wooden box that has been fitted with window pane panels. It's unique, subtly decorative & conveniently reusable!", '6 BONUS Greeting Cards', "(New Year, Thank You, Merry Christmas, Mother's Day, Happy Birthday & Valentine's Day “Love” card)", '♥ He or she will fall in love with this boxed spa gift for mom, dad, husband, wife, girlfriend, etc. ♥', "Whether you're looking for cute spa gifts or luxury bath gifts, you know you can count on Pinkleaf.", "What occasion will you celebrate next? Click '", 'ADD TO CART', "' to order your spa gift basket now!"]
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Scent': 'Sandalwood', 'Brand': 'Pinkleaf', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '3.2 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '11.3 x 3.5 x 8 inches; 3.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'PL-5267', 'UPC': '638037695267', 'Manufacturer': 'Pinkleaf'}
Review Text: Great little kit for a "spa" type day. The scents of the Sandalwood and Ylang oil are not very strong. The shower gel because of the oil will not lather very good but my skin felt good after using it. Didn't get dry or itchy. The bath salts were very nicely scented and was great in the bath. I would have just purchased the bath salts as the shower gel is the only complaint in this kit. Was expecting a better lather and more of a scent but overall it was a nice gift and came packaged in a nice wooden double door box that the kids want to paint now. Wife and kids happy.
Review Title: Nice small "spa" gift box. Scent isn't strong.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Polish Base Top Coat Striping Roll Tapes Nail Art Kit Lacquer Manicure Varnish Set Soak Off UV LED FairyGlo 7ml 1019
Review Date: 2018/02/23
Store: FairyGlo
Product Description: ['Exclusive', 'Nail Art Brand:', 'FairyGlo', 'Nails Product:', '6pcs Nail Polish + 1 x Base Coat + 1 x Top Coat + 2 x Striping Rolls', 'Volume:', '7ml/0.27fl.oz', 'Certificate:', 'MSDS,SGS', 'Suitable Lamp:', 'UV/LED/CCFL Lamp.9w, 12w, 24w, 36w, 48w ect.', 'Usage:', "STEP 1 : Gently buffer your nails surface so they're not shiny and smooth. STEP 2 : Apply base coat - cure with LED or UV nail dryer lamp. STEP 3 : Apply 1st thin coat of polish - cure. STEP 4 : Apply 2nd thin coat of polish - cure. --Apply 3rd coat if necessary. STEP 5 : Wipe nails with rubbing alcohol(cleanser) to remove residue. STEP 6 : Take out striping roll tape, stick onto your nails ,make out the patterns you prefer  STEP 7 : Apply Top Coat  --Curing time: UV light for 2 mins, LED light for 60 secs.STEP 8 : Enjoy your DIY manicure salon for 14~21 days", 'Warm Tips:', '1.the actual colors may be slightly different from the picture beuse of the lighting and computer color.', 'Why did the polish chips peels quickly ?', '1.Not file the nails slightly. if you want the polish last longer,the first step is important,file the nail and keep them dry.   2.May be your base and top coat are not good quality. Our brand base and top coat will be better,it is our customers feedback to us ,if wear our polish,it is better to combine our brand base and top.   3.Base and top wear too thick or inhomogeneous then it will peels easily.', 'Customer Service within 24 hours :', 'Any problem please feel free to contact us,we will try our best to help you. About FairyGlo We have 400 regular colors (pure, holographic,fluorescent and glitter colors), 205 colors mood changing colors, builder gel , chameleon gel and othr gel products and Nail Dryer Lamp and other nail art tools! --We provided the Strongest SOAK OFF GEL NAIL POLISH']
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FairyGlo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Light Grey - 1441,Orange Red - 1462,Mint Green - 1467,Camellia Rose - 1476,Fuchsia Rose - 1477,Bright Pink - 1530Light Grey - 1441,Orange Red - 1462,Mint Green - 1467,Camellia Rose - 1476,Fuchsia Rose - 1477,Bright Pink - 1530   See more', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Peel Off', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Weight': '162 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 1 inches; 5.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '799355308670', 'Manufacturer': 'FairyGlo'}
Review Text: These have been ok. Even with a base coat, and top coat they don't last much longer than a week. The colors are nice and bright but just poor polish. Can't say i'd use these again. The string tape made more of a mess then look fancy. I'm not a nail artist but watching some videos on how to apply they just don't turn out or last long.
Review Title: Didn't last as long as I had hoped.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Bombs, SAZEN Bath Bomb with Natural & Organic Essential Oils, Shea Coconut Butter for Skin Moisturize, Bubble Spa Bath, Birthday Mothers Day Christmas Handmade Gift Set for Women Kids Her Him
Review Date: 2020/08/24
Store: SAZEN
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SAZEN', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Package Dimensions': '12.17 x 6.26 x 2.24 inches; 2.65 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SAZEN 01', 'UPC': '745103723622', 'Manufacturer': 'SAZEN'}
Review Text: These are great for our younger kids that love bath bombs. These are about the perfect size for our kids as they don't fill up the bath tub. They don't take much time to dissolve in warm bath water. This was a package of 18 round bath bombs. A couple of them were broken, maybe during shipping or just not enough ingredients but the kids didn't mind at all. They are all individually wrapped in paper so they didn't make a mess in the box. They are scented with some kind of a flower scent which is good and not as overpowering. There is around 8 different colors that does color the bath water. I haven't notice any staining or rings in the tub from using just these bombs.
Review Title: Great value
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
Review Date: 2020/08/31
Store: Azun
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Azun', 'Material': 'Mesh', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13 x 11 x 1 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '13 x 11 x 1 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a good size for our large tub. It is comfortable and soft however the outer material is a little rough and scratchy. It has 6 large suction cups on the back to keep it in place and once stuck to the tub it didn't move at all. I actually had to look for the little tab on a couple cups and lift by them.  There is a plastic hook sewn into the top center to hang it up to dry. We just used the suction cups to suction it to the back of the shower. Once dried it came in a gray and clear bag that we store it in the closet.
Review Title: Comfortable but material is a little scratchy
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The shopping history indicates a strong preference for self-care and spa-related products, particularly those focusing on relaxation, skin nourishment, and aesthetic enjoyment. The individual consistently expresses interest in gender-neutral scents such as sandalwood and coconut, favoring products that incorporate natural and organic ingredients. 

A pattern emerges around purchasing bath and body items, including spa gift sets, bath bombs, and accessories that enhance the bathing experience. The sentiment analysis reveals a desire for quality but also a degree of disappointment with performance in some items, particularly related to lather and longevity of nail products.

The individual values aesthetic appeal and unique packaging, illustrated by the choice of beautifully designed gift items and spa accessories. However, there is a noticeable sensitivity to product effectiveness and quality, as reflected in critiques of certain products not meeting expectations in longevity or functionality. 

Price sensitivity appears moderate, with occasional purchases leaning towards value (e.g., larger sets of bath bombs) while also indulging in higher-end spa gift sets. Overall, the core preferences reflect a commitment to nurturing experiences for self and family, focusing on quality ingredients, sensory appeal, and thoughtful presentation in product choices.

target_interaction.title: Big and sharply cut, but cleans great!
target_interaction.text: Got this to use on my face. My face tends to get oily through out the day, probably more then most. This charcoal soap is great. A little more expense for typical bar soap, but the same as buying a bottle of facewash. This soap is a rather large bar and didn't fit into my soap box. After using for a week, my soap container will shut with the edges worn down a little. This soap is my go to for face washing and even my beard. The scent is very light and doesn't linger. It lathers good and after you rinse with warm water my face feels smooth and clean. By the end of the day my face has a little oil again, but doesn't seem to be as bad. I believe my redness and couple acne spots has improved and more face washing hasn't dried out my skin.
target_interaction.title_meta: TCM Men's Cleansing Activated Charcoal Bar Soap - For all skin types - 5oz (1 Pack)
